description: This file is a CLI script for initializing various types of software projects using command-line arguments. It handles argument parsing, creating project configurations, generating template initializations, and outputting JSON results. The script supports multiple project types (e.g., react, python, django, flutter), and demonstrates comprehensive use of dependencies like argparse, json, os, typing, and custom modules.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Represents the initialization information for project templates, including commands and configurations.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Configuration object encapsulating project parameters such as name, version, description, author, type, output path, and custom parameters.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Enumeration or class providing string-to-type conversion for project types.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] parse_parameters(params_str: str)
methods.description: Parses a comma-separated key=value string into a dictionary with properly typed values.

methods.name: ProjectConfig create_project_config(args)
methods.description: Creates a ProjectConfig instance from CLI arguments.

methods.name: str make_path_absolute(path: str, base_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts a relative path to an absolute path based on a base directory.

methods.name: dict template_init_info_to_dict(init_info: TemplateInitInfo, project_path: Path)
methods.description: Serializes TemplateInitInfo into a dictionary with absolute paths for init files.

methods.name: output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
methods.description: Outputs combined success status, message, and template info as JSON.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Entry point for command-line execution, orchestrates project initialization process.
